EU imposes sanctions against five Guatemalans for undermining democracyThe European Union on Friday imposed sanctions against five individuals from Guatemala for undermining democracy, the rule of law or the peaceful transfer of power in Central America's most populous nation. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 14:10:59 GMT YRH2P5K3RRLNRKIQGVOIGJR3DQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/eu-imposes-sanctions-against- Five-guatemalans-undermining-democracy-2024-02-02/Reuters世界美洲
Indian Muslim leaders urge government to end to mosque-temple disputesTop Muslim leaders in India called on Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government on Friday to end disputes over mosques and Hindu temples, saying the minority Muslim population was feeling under threat and their places of worship should be protected. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 14:08:59 GMT 7AZFOHLBGBKX7IA2GYTARLFMLY https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-muslim-leaders-urge-government-end-mosque-temple-disputes-2024-02-02/Rupam Jain世界印度
Ukraine suspends senior defence official amid corruption probeUkrainian Defence Minister Rustem Umerov has suspended a senior official while authorities investigate suspected corruption in the procurement of wepoans, his ministry said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 14:07:07 GMT OOCTML5IFMPBBU2YFVB7NAR5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-suspends-senior-defence-official-amid-corruption-probe-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
US court blocks Florida law barring Chinese citizens from owning propertyA U.S. appeals court has blocked Florida from enforcing a ban on Chinese citizens owning homes or land in the state against two Chinese nationals who were in the process of buying property when the law was adopted. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 13:39:46 GMT R7ONJLAMRZLBVLPN57SGE3YZDM https://www.reuters.com/legal/us-court-blocks-florida-law-barring-chinese-citizens-owning-property-2024-02-02/Daniel Wiessner合法的诉讼
Lawyer for Russian dissident Navalny put on wanted list - RIARussia's interior ministry has put a lawyer for jailed Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny on its wanted list after charging her in absentia with extremism, the RIA news agency reported Fri, 02 Feb 2024 13:35:34 GMT YBJDLM2ISBIH7KDKMTGJOOYOXY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/lawyer- Russian-dissident-navalny-put-wanted-list-ria-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Cuba puts the brakes on planned public transportation rate hikeCuba said late on Thursday it would delay an unpopular proposal to hike fares for public transportation just one day after the government put off a planned 5-fold rise in fuel prices due to a cyber-attack. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 12:42:47 GMT Q5DPQWSRWJLNVJK42ZYLIFAIBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-puts-brakes-planned-public-transportation-rate-hike-2024-02-02/Reuters世界美洲
Belgium summons Israeli ambassador after its building in Gaza is bombedBelgium on Friday summoned the Israeli ambassador after a Belgian development agency building in Gaza City was bombed, ad said it planned to raised the issue of compensation. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 12:35:12 GMT YRCTYF3ONJOGLKOWAOUGNNVRPA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/belgium-summons-israeli-ambassador-after-its-building-gaza-is-bombed-2024-02-02/Reuters世界中东
Desperate for news, Gazans struggle with mobile networkHamzeh Tabash walks to the Egyptian border every day from his tent in Gaza for a faltering mobile signal so he can send voice messages to loved ones separated by war and hopefully receive one in return. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 12:21:27 GMT BLXNQW44GRPN3OB45P5JSIQZX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/desperate-news-gazans-struggle-with-mobile-network-2024-02-02/Mohammad Salem世界中东
Polish farmers plan general strike, blockade of Ukraine borderPolish farmers' Solidarity trade union plans a general strike starting next Friday with a blockade of border crossings between Poland and Ukraine, it said, joining similar protests all over Europe. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 12:18:29 GMT DBY2NQVA6BPABFH43UHVZUGYZM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-plan-general-strike-blockade-ukraine-border-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: Poland to withdraw court cases against EU climate policies - sourcesPoland will no longer take the EU to court to attempt to cancel numerous climate change policies, and is preparing to withdraw lawsuits the previous government had filed to do this, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 11:54:53 GMT PY7ZR5LFGBOHXHYGMBZWMSFGNY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-withdraw-court-cases-against-eu-climate-policies-sources-2024-02-02/Kate Abnett, Marek Strzelecki可持续发展气候与能源
Georgian woman ordered detained for defacing Stalin icon in TbilisiA court in Georgia has ordered five days' detention for a woman who defaced a religious icon depicting Soviet leader Josef Stalin, an act which ignited large protests last month in the capital Tbilisi, local media reported on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 11:19:35 GMT SL6ZUSIKEJJOBBZU6G45Q6O5LM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/georgian-woman-ordered-detained-defaceing-stalin-icon-tbilisi-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
